alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 4:57PM EDT until May 06 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Barnwell County in central South Carolina... Bamberg County in central South Carolina... Central Aiken County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 457 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Barnwell, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Barnwell, Bamberg, Denmark, Williston, Blackville, New Ellenton, Branchville, Barnwell State Park, Rivers Bridge State Park, Ehrhardt, Springfield, Hilda, Salley, Neeses, Norway, Rowesville, Snelling, Olar, Perry and Kline. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
